text: Gulraiz Akhtar (2 February 1943 - 1 November 2021) was a Pakistani field hockey player. He was born in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. He won his first gold medal at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City. ==Position== Gulraiz used to play on left-half position. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Pakistani field hockey players Category:Olympic gold medalists for Pakistan Category:Sportspeople from Rawalpindi
title: Gulraiz Akhtar
